description: A 'salt of the Earth' Missouri woman on vacation in Paris slowly gives in to the advances of a pushy--and very much married--French yuppie. Will their unconventional romance last until September, when she must return home?
keywords: kissing while having sex,female rear nudity,female full frontal nudity,wife meets her husband's mistress,female nudity
name: Until September

review.name: An anti-romance
review.reviewBody: True, the setting in Paris is great. The actors are fine. The story is a twisted morality play. Is it supposed to say that if you want someone badly enough, it's OK to hurt everyone else along the way? In a real romance, you sort of want less clich√© than the man who has become bored with his wife and is willing to dump his family, and the woman who is OK with encouraging him to do this. So what if they are decent looking and if Karen Allen shows off her body? The characters are still self-absorbed and reprehensible. Maybe the moral of the story is "you get what you deserve". I give it a 4, only for the fast scan potential through the "male interest" bits.

trailer.description: A Missouri woman on vacation in Paris slowly gives in to the advances of a pushy, and married, French yuppie. Will their unconventional romance last until September, when she must return home?
